content: this is a beginner to advanced beginner pattern this pattern will let you learn or will be best if you have already learned - back loop only stitch chain stitch single_crochet decrease stitch magic_ring single_crochet stitch single_crochet increase stitch and sewing a figurine together with a tapestry needle equipment needed - 4 0 mm body arm legs shoes face crown spike large and small - 3 0 mm arm detailing face detailing - tapestry needle yarn needed - 1 skein 100g dark red legs body arms - 1 skein 100g white face - 1 skein 50g bright yellow arm detailing banner - 1 skein 50g black face detailing - 1 skein 100g gold yellow crown spike large and small - 1 skein 50g bright red banner - 1 skein 100g tan shoes
